info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...An intense snow shower will impact portions of central Silver Bow County through 545 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported an intense snow shower near Silver Bow, or near Butte, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Butte, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Divide, Nissler, Melrose, Janney and Newcomb. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 217 and 231. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
